text: (nabiye!) ‘meya ohu boruvata manakkalpita kara gatteya’ yayi (oba gæna) ovun pavasannehuda? (ese nam, nabiye!) oba mese pavasanu: “meya boruvata manakkalpita kale nam, (e venuven) allah (mava danduvam nokaranu ætda? e avasthavedi allah)ta erehiva oba ma hata kisima (udavvak) karannata saktiyak nomættan (bavata pat vanava noveda!) me gæna (mata viruddhava) oba kumak nam pavasannehuda, eva ohu hondin dæna sitinneya. (ebævin) matat obatat atare ohuma meyata pramanavat saksiyak vasayen sitinneya. ohuma itamat ksama karanneku ha dayabaravantayeku vasayen sitinneya”
